enWisdom: God-wariness is the cornerstone [all] of good deeds
God-wariness is the leader of moral virtues
God-wariness is the key to uprightness

Wisdom: يُسْتَدَلُّ عَلَى دِينِ الرَّجُلِ بِحُسْنِ تَقْوَاهُ وَصِدْقِ وَرَعِهِ
enWisdom: The religiousness of a man is deduced by the virtue of his God-wariness and the truth of his piety

Wisdom: يُسْتَدَلُّ عَلَى الْإِيمَانِ بِكَثْرَةِ التُّقَى وَمِلْكِ الشَّهْوَةِ وَغَلَبَةِ الْهَوَى
enWisdom: The faith [of a person] is deduced by increased fear [of Allah], controlling lust and overcoming lowly desires
